website_summaries.verdict: An affordable treat that remains useful after it's consumed.
pros: Treat sticks attach easily to any cage with the included clip
Triple toasted grains appeal to birds' love of crunchy treats
When all the grains are gone, leave the bare stick in the cage for your bird to safely peck away at
cons: Seeds fall off of the stick quite easily

customer_reviews.title: Great product shipped with TLC!
customer_reviews.text: My canary Romeo loves his Vitakraft Crunch! Amazon has taken every effort to ship Crunch in a container that no longet gets crunched. The seed and stick maintains its itegrity!
customer_reviews.author: kattididit

customer_reviews.title: Canary loves these but much off the stick
customer_reviews.text: My canary and my mother's canary both love these treats. I would have given 5 stars but about 1/3 to 1/2 of the seed mixture seems to fall off the stick during shipment. Would be great if the honey held the mixture a little better. The birds do love it though.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!
customer_reviews.text: My canaries and finches look forward for this treat "Baked Crunch Sticks Egg Honey", they just loving it!! I highly recommend this product to any bird lovers, especially Finch and Canary. The packaging and the freshness of the product are excellent!!
customer_reviews.author: Andreas

customer_reviews.title: My Canary Is Happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice treat for my canary, and at a great price. He loves/devours them and they are made of wholesome ingredients for a healthy bird. They are always on my shelf because it is such a great buy vs getting them from the local pet shops.
customer_reviews.author: GTR

customer_reviews.title: Yummy good!
customer_reviews.text: My Canary loves this treat! eats on it through the day. Yummy good! Put all my bird treats and bird food in the freezer keeps food fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Watch yo back! These birds are ruthless creatures!
customer_reviews.text: My red factor canaries and gouldian finches Love these sticks of yellow crack!!
customer_reviews.author: CharlieBrownInAz

customer_reviews.title: The bird loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the bird lkes it, that means my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: gtt

customer_reviews.title: All 3 of my birds love these
customer_reviews.text: My Canary practically lives on these. Great price, cheaper than pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: mary e turner

customer_reviews.title: Sunny loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Sunny, my little canary, just loves these sticks, and he can finish one off in a day! I make sure he eats his regular seed too, but these sticks make a very tasty treat for him, and keeps him singing!
customer_reviews.author: Sneakypie

customer_reviews.title: My sunny loves it
customer_reviews.text: My sunny loves it and that makes me happy. Will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Creations of Dreams

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Alex my canary loves those treats and they are hard to find. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: My birds love these sticks
customer_reviews.text: I need to order more. My birds can't leave them alone.
customer_reviews.author: MayButterfly

customer_reviews.title: Eaten up too quickly
customer_reviews.text: My canaries loved these but it's just seed covering a dowel, so it's gone in no time at all. I don't think it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: tasty treat for the birds
customer_reviews.text: this is like crack to my canaries, they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for canary
customer_reviews.text: My canary loved them. She made a big mess eating them
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Sodano

customer_reviews.title: Treats are not on sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Received the three pack. Two of the three packages contained the treat so old it was not even on the stick but loose in package. All three packages contained product that was very dry and seemed outdated. Will not purchase these again, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: steve proffer

customer_reviews.title: Good Treat
customer_reviews.text: Our canary loves them. He goes through one in about 3 to 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Oldro

customer_reviews.text: My canary is attached to this treat whenever I put it in his cage.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Seller needs to provide better protection for product when shipping through the
customer_reviews.text: Product is what I wanted. Seller needs to provide better protection for product when shipping through the USPS
customer_reviews.author: Joe Liedtky

customer_reviews.title: Panchito loves them
customer_reviews.text: My mons bird loves these. Got them quicker than expected.
customer_reviews.author: adriana beltran

customer_reviews.title: Canary Treat - Fun and Flavorful
customer_reviews.text: My canary thoroughly enjoys this treat. It has the added benefit of giving him an activity that he seems to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

product_meta.title: Vitakraft Triple Baked Crunch Sticks With Egg And Honey Canary Treat (3 Packs / 2 Treats Per Pack)
product_meta.description: Vitakraft Triple Baked Crunch Sticks with Egg and Honey Canary Treat (3 Packs / 2 Treats Per Pack)
feature_bullets: 3 Packages each containing 2 treats (6 Treats Total)
Triple baked for crunchiness and taste
Natural wood stick inside is made to be chewed for long-lasting fun even after the treat is gone
